DMUMarkupHdr.Title: Markup
DMUMarkupHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a markup linked to the loaded context. If several contexts are loaded in the session, select one in the Markup dialog box.
DMUMarkupHdr.LongHelp: In the Markup dialog box, select a context (if required) and enter a name and description for the markup.
DMUOldMarkupHdr.Title: Old Markup
DMUOldMarkupHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a Old markup linked to the loaded context. If several contexts are loaded in the session, select one in the Markup dialog box.
DMUOldMarkupHdr.LongHelp: In the Markup dialog box, select a context (if required) and enter a name and description for the markup.
DMURenameMarkupHdr.Title: Rename
DMURenameMarkupHdr.ShortHelp: Updates the name of a markup
